text: The Matrix Market exchange formats are a set of human readable, ASCII-based file formats designed to facilitate the exchange of matrix data. The file formats were designed and adopted for the Matrix Market, a NIST repository for test data for use in comparative studies of algorithms for numerical linear algebra.http://math.nist.gov/MatrixMarket/ == See also == * Harwell-Boeing file format == References == == External links == * Matrix Market exchange formats Category:Computer file formats
title: Matrix Market exchange formats
